Name: Maze Mania: The Ultimate 3D Maze Game
About the game: In the world of Maze Mania, no maze is too difficult. Push your skills to the limit as you navigate around almost impossible mazes. Explore beautifully crafted levels with unique soundtracks to test your skills to the limit. In this 3D twist, figuring out mazes has never been so good. Game Features - Beautiful Graphics Maze Mania has over 40 unique levels. All of the levels have great backgrounds, strong bright colours and awesome mazes. Each level is better than the last. We have designed it to pop out and make you keep exploring. - Challenge yourself with the near impossible! These mazes are designed to test your logic. In this 3D twist, each maze is uniquely designed to test you and push you. Your choices matter, take the wrong turn and you won't be able to complete the level. - Never seen before 3D mazes! See for yourself.
